journals.notes:
Unfortunately, this log will not help us figure out what's wrong. You would have to either know what causes the crash, so we could reproduce it or compile a debug build of ET:L and run it under a debugger.

> etlegacy-2.71rc1:
This version is outdated. Please download the latest ET:L binaries or installer from the "download page":http://www.etlegacy.com/download

First, try using the newer ET:L version and if it still crashes, please let us know how we can reproduce the crash if you find out.

Is this a release version of ETPub? Your crash is mod related:

Backtrace:
(1) /home/pandfi/.etlwolf/etpub/cgame.mp.i386.so(CG_Respawn+0x198) [0xd43e9328]

http://www.etpub.org/

subject: Signal: Segmentation fault (11)
description:
Apologies if this should be reported elsewhere. I've had occassional crashes recently. Details copied from console follow. System is Kubuntu 64 running etlegacy-2.71rc1:

meep was killed by |OC|RogerWilco's MP40
mAss was shelled by =SG=Snagged NY's artillery support
|OC|RogerWilco was killed by =OF=Critter's Garand
banner: Please Have Fun!
Petra Kelly was killed by master's Akimbo .45ACP 1911s
master vaporized himself.
fires0x seems to be having a bad day! 5 deaths without a kills!
jonnyoblivious is on a killing spree! (5 kills)
fires0x was killed by jonnyoblivious's Thompson
Allied team escaped with the Gold Crates!
-8<------- Crash Information ------->8-
   Please forward to etpub mod team.   
---------------------------------------
